text: Karim Jafar is a former Iraqi football defender who played for Iraq at the 1984 Summer Olympics. Karim played for Iraq in 1984. ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Living people Category:Al-Mina'a SC players Category:Association football defenders Category:Olympic footballers of Iraq Category:Footballers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Karim Jafar
